description: '''Kaushal S. Inamdar''' (born 2 October 1971) is an Indian [[music composer]] and singer in [[Marathi language|Marathi]] and [[Hindi]] movies. His work in music spans from composing music for films, television, drama to events, concerts in Hindi and Marathi, composing music for ballets, advertisements, and also albums. He is currently settled at [[Goregaon]], a [[Mumbai]] suburb.
